name: Wyatt Alken
description: Wyatt was a6th Streeterwho stole and sold cars. In 2077, in his parking lot inCharter Hill, he was tasked with guardingSamuraiparaphernalia that had been taken fromNancy Hartley's son,Dan. He also got into his possession Dan's car, aRayfield Caliburn. Vhas the option to kill, incapacitate, or just sneak past him. He is in the line of sight by most of the present 6th Streeters so encountering him will most likely result in a firefight.
